dcterms:creator: X. Fu
J. Zhang
Z. Meng
I. King
dcterms:description: The DBLP dataset comes from the DBLP Academic Search website, where the node set includes authors, papers, conferences, and terms. The classification target of the node classification task in this dataset is author, which is divided into four categories.
dcterms:title: DBLP Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Zhao
X. Wang
C. Shi
Z. Liu
Y. Ye
dcterms:description: The ACM dataset extracts the network of papers from the ACM database, where the node set includes papers, authors, and subjects. The classification target of the node classification task in this dataset is paper, which is divided into three categories.
dcterms:title: ACM Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Li
D. Ding
B. Kao
Y. Sun
N. Mamoulis
dcterms:description: The Freebase dataset is a movie dataset from the Freebase website, where the node set includes movies, actors, directors, and writers. The classification target of the node classification task in this dataset is movie, which is divided into three categories.
dcterms:title: Freebase Dataset
